definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: How about tidying up a bit in the sitting-room ?
sentences.chinese: 把起居室稍微打掃一下怎麼樣？

sentences.english: The exchange rate fluctuates every day.
sentences.chinese: 今天的匯率比昨天稍微低一點兒。

sentences.english: Can these activities sightly release my pain？
sentences.chinese: 這些能稍微緩釋我的痛嗎？

sentences.english: Thoroughly rinse the turkey, and discard the brine mixture.
sentences.chinese: 倒掉浸火雞的鹽水，稍微沖洗一下火雞。

sentences.english: Longer trips will incur a small charge.
sentences.chinese: 再長點的旅途則會稍微收點小錢。

sentences.english: The first peak that we climbed is the "Nazogl", which is the peak slightly left off the middle of this picture.
sentences.chinese: 像片中間稍微偏左的第一個山頂就是納佐格山頂。

sentences.english: The author pulldown is a little bit more complicated.
sentences.chinese: 作者下拉列表稍微複雜一些。

sentences.english: Squint your eyes a little and move your head slowly to make it look like the world is spinning around you.
sentences.chinese: 稍微眯眼，緩慢的移動你的頭好想世界在你周圍旋轉。

sentences.english: Boring white paper? Too commonplace. Let's find something a little more eyecatching.
sentences.chinese: 乏味的白色的紙？太普通了，得找個稍微搶眼的。

sentences.english: I'm sorry. I was a little late.
sentences.chinese: 很抱歉，稍微來遲了一會兒。

sentences.english: The face of Tess flushed slightly, but still she did not pause.
sentences.chinese: 苔絲的臉稍微一紅，但是仍然捆着麥捆。

sentences.english: Hold applicator at a slight angle and apply color to the base of the lashes.
sentences.chinese: 以稍微傾斜的角度拿着眼線筆，從睫毛的根部上色。

sentences.english: It kind of short-circuits the pain.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥膏可以稍微縮短疼痛的時間。

sentences.english: Place tablespoonfuls of mixture onto a baking paper lined tray. Flatten slightly with a floured fork.
sentences.chinese: 湯勺將混合勺滿烤紙，叉將其稍微壓扁。

sentences.english: Armhole Balance This allows a set-in-sleeve to hang slightly forward and follow the curvature of the arm.
sentences.chinese: 即裝袖後，袖子應稍微前傾，以符合手臂的形狀。

sentences.english: Turn the heat down and stir briefly and let cook for about 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 轉小火，稍微翻炒，大約5分鐘。

definition: erhua variant of 一點|一点[yi1 dian3]
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
Diandian (Chinese microblogging and social networking website)
almost/nearly/more or less/about the same/good enough/not bad
classifier indicating a small amount or small number greater than 1: some, a few, several
